questions.question: What is the primary aim of using Lasso and Ridge regression in the experiment?

answers.a: To improve prediction accuracy and model interpretability
answers.b: To increase the complexity of the model
answers.c: To eliminate the need for feature selection

explanations.a: Correct! Lasso and Ridge regression aim to improve prediction accuracy and simplify the model by regularizing coefficients.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Regularization reduces complexity, not increases it.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Lasso performs feature selection but does not eliminate its need.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Regularization may not necessarily reduce training time.

questions.question: Which regularization technique sets some coefficients to zero, effectively performing feature selection?

explanations.a: Incorrect. Ridge shrinks coefficients but does not set them to zero.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Linear regression does not involve regularization.
explanations.c: Correct! Lasso regression uses L1 regularization, which can set some coefficients to zero.

questions.question: How does Ridge regression improve model stability?

answers.b: By adding L2 regularization to discourage large coefficients

explanations.a: Incorrect. Ridge regression does not set coefficients to zero.
explanations.b: Correct! Ridge regression uses L2 regularization to stabilize the model by reducing large coefficients.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Regularization aims to simplify the model.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Ridge does not perform automatic feature selection.

questions.question: What is the primary evaluation metric used to compare the performance of the models?

explanations.a: Partially correct, but RMSE is not the only metric used.
explanations.b: Partially correct, but R² is one of the metrics among others.
explanations.c: Partially correct, but MSE alone does not provide a complete evaluation.
explanations.d: Correct! All these metrics are used to evaluate model performance.

questions.question: Which type of regularization does Ridge regression apply?

explanations.a: Incorrect. L1 regularization is used in Lasso.
explanations.b: Correct! Ridge regression applies L2 regularization.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Combination of L1 and L2 is used in ElasticNet.
